full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG SER BU'I SGRA DBYANGS KYI MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BRJOD CING, THAL MO BRDAB, BLUD RDZAS SOGS MA LUS PA GNOD PA'I PHYOGS SU BSKYAL, BZLOG PAS 'TSAMS GCOD BYED CING, RJES MCHOD DKYUS BZHIN BYED, THABS DANG RTEN 'BRAL LA BRTEN PA'I, GLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG BLUNG SBYIN 'DI, KOO SHRI BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL DANG, ,RANG GI NYE 'KHOR SLOB BU NI, BLO LDAN RIG GROL LA SOGS PAS, BSKUL PHYIR 'DOD @004B LTAR CHOS RJE YI, THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS, STONG MED SER BU'I SGRA DBYANGS KYI, LEGS BSHAD BCOL CHUNG 'DI SGRAGS PA'I, ,DGE BAS MAR GYUR SEMS CAN RNAMS, GLO BUR RKYEN DANG BRAL GYUR CIG, 'DI LA MKHAS RNAMS THUGS MA 'KHREL, BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR RGYAN DU BYON, ,'PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI AER KHE PI LIG THU YE SHES BLO LDAN NO,, ,,DGE'O, ,)
